text: Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick (born January 25, 1979) is an American lawyer, businesswoman and politician. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives for Florida's 20th congressional district since 2022. She ran for the same seat against then- incumbent Alcee Hastings two times in 2018 and 2020. She is the first Haitian- American Democrat in Congress, She is the second Haitian American in Congress overall after Republican Mia Love of Utah. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Lawyers from Miami Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Businesspeople from Miami Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African- American politicians
title: Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick
